#Text=Wikinews interviews Flame about special effects at New Zealand 's Rock2Wgtn festival
#Text=Thursday , August 7 , 2008
#Text=File photo of KISS , who headlined night one .
#Text=Image : Wok .
#Text=Across Easter weekend Wellington , New Zealand was host to Rock2Wgtn , an international two-day hard rock festival .
#Text=Large crowds showed up at Westpac Stadium to see the various acts .
#Text=The world has never seen an event of this kind before , and New Zealand has never had any kind of major rock festival or multi-day music festival .
#Text=Day one featured three theatrical acts .
#Text=Finnish band Lordi , known for their monster costumes , opened the night .

#Text=They were followed by the US shock rocker Alice Cooper , whose themed set included the horror theatrics regularly associated with him and a hanging stunt he recently restarted after a gallows collapse nearly killed him two decades ago .
#Text=The night was headlined by the distinctively costumed band KISS , complete with their famed black-and-white makeup .
#Text=The first major act on the stage on day two was the American hard rock/ glam metal band Poison .
#Text=After Poison , British act Whitesnake took to the stage and performed their set to the crowd .
#Text=British-born American rocker Ozzy Osbourne , who , as well as a solo career , fronts the world-famous Black Sabbath , was the second night 's headline act .
#Text=The festival 's entertainment did not stop at the six main acts .
#Text=There was also support performances from three New Zealand bands - The Symphony of Screams , The Valves and Sonic Altar .
#Text=Their sets were accompanied by a special effects package from award-winning studio Weta Workshops , who are known for their work on movies such as The Lord of the Rings film trilogy .
#Text=This came in the form of '
#Text=Drusila the Dragon ' , which rose up to a height of six foot and wigspan and moved for the audience , shining lasers from its eyes and breathing red smoke .
#Text=Flame Fire Productions were hired to put on a fire show featuring several dancers alongside the performers .
#Text=Also performing were six local guitarists and a group of ' zombie ' cheerleaders .
#Text=Wikinews was able to secure two exclusive interviews with those responsible behind the scenes for putting on such a show .
#Text=Weta Workshop 's Philip Sharpe , who supervised the project and Milly Bea , current manageress of Flame Fire Productions , discussed their roles .

#Text=In the first installment , Milly Bea tells us about " a definite highlight " for Flame and lets us know everything from her thoughts on Gene Simmons 's tongue to just how much kerosene it takes to put on a fire show at a rock fest .
#Text=Interview
#Text=( ( Wikinews ( Blood Red Sandman ) ) ) How did you come to be involved with Rock2Wgtn ?
#Text=Milly Bea : We came to be involved thru a recommendation from one of the stunt guys , unfortunately I am not sure who ?
#Text=Someone Holly Wademan had met in past years .
#Text=Then Rok2Wtgn contacted us and we began liaising from about December .
